Subject: REST <=> follow your nose?

Hi REST people,

Some simple questions that might lead to interesting discu=
ssions:

How far do you agree that REST and hypermedia are about following =
one=92s nose?
Is the =93following your nose=94 thing an essential part of R=
EST?
And what is there more to REST than can be explained by =93following y=
our nose=94?

All input welcome!

Best,

Ruben

PS This post was inspired b=
y Erik Wilde=92s blogpost about describing REST =96 http://dret.typepad.com=
/dretblog/2012/03/rest-layers.html
